```{r include=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(rmarkdown))

switch(output.file.type,
       html = {opts_chunk$set(fig.width=14, fig.height=8)}
       , latex = {opts_chunk$set(fig.width=14, fig.height=6)}
       )
```
